name: "The Usual"
description:
"The Usual"

You're hired!
Welcome to the surreal space of a pub in lockdown. 
Just because we're supposed to be closed - doesn't mean the regulars won't stop coming! 

Get to know the last occupants: explore their lives and the connection they share to their favourite watering hole. 

------------------------------------------------------

Use left-click or space bar to progress through the story.
Choose dialogue respones to shape your relationships.
Press F11 to run in borderless fullscreen after running.

----------------------------------------------

Made using Unity & Fungus.
Special thanks to Maddalena Grattarola & Goldsmiths UoL.
